data.title: Lipovitan-D Rugby Championship: Where to watch around the world
data.meta_description: Fans around the globe are now enjoying live Test match rugby on NZR+, with broadcasts bringing the excitement directly into homes in territories that traditionally don't receive live coverage.
data.text:
This groundbreaking initiative in partnership with SANZAAR provides fans in markets where no broadcast deal exists access to top-tier rugby matches without any cost on NZR+.

Lipovitan-D Rugby Championship Kicks Off

Once again, this weekend promises to be a rugby fan's dream, featuring two live Test matches as the Lipovitan-D Rugby Championship kicks into gear. The lineup includes:

Australia v South Africa at 4.30pm AEST, Saturday 10 August

All Blacks v Argentina at 7.05pm NZT, Saturday 10 August

These matches are part of an exciting 2024 season on NZR+, which will feature a total 24 live Test matches, including 12 over the six weekends of the Lipovotan-D Rugby Championship.

Free Streaming in Select Territories

Fans in various regions can enjoy free streaming of these matches on NZR+. The available territories for free streaming include:

China, India, and Sri Lanka, Portugal, Albania, Armenia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Belgium, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Kazakhstan, Kosovo, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Macedonia, Malta, Moldova, Montenegro, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Romania, Russia, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Turkey, and Ukraine

Register and Watch

To watch these matches live and free, fans need to register on NZR+. This simple process opens the door to an incredible lineup of rugby matches, bringing the best of international rugby directly to fans.

What if I am not in one of those territories?

If your territory isnâ€™t listed above, here is a list of local broadcasters where you catch the live action around the world:

Sky TV New Zealand: New Zealand

SuperSport: Africa and adjacent islands

Flo Sport: USA

Sky UK: United Kingdom of Great Britain (England, Scotland and Wales) and Northern Ireland, Ireland, Channel Islands and Isle of Man

Sky Italia: Italy, Vatican City, San Marino and Canton Ticino, Switzerland

Channel 9 and Stan: Australia

ESPN+: Canada, Central America and South America

WOWOW: Japan

Digicel: American Samoa, Cook Islands, Federated States of Micronesia, Fiji, French Polynesia, Nauru, New Caledonia, Niue, Papua New Guinea, Solomon Islands, Tokelau, Tonga, Tuvalu, Vanuatu, Wallis and Futuna and Western Samoa.

Canal+: France (French Overseas Departments and Territories included), Monaco, Luxembourg and French Speaking Switzerland

Premier Sports: Bangladesh, Bhutan, Brunei, Burma (Myanmar), Cambodia, Federated States of Micronesia, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Kiribati, Kyrgyzstan, Laos, Macau, Malaysia, Maldives, Marianas, Marshall Islands, Mongolia, Myanmar, Nepal, Northern Marianas, North Korea, Pakistan, Palau, Philippines, Singapore, South Korea, Tajikistan, Taiwan (Republic of China), Thailand, Timor-Leste, Vietnam.

Telefonica: Spain and Andorra
